Package com.salesforce.marketingcloud.android.demoapp

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationClass
    ApplicationClass is the primary application class.
    BaseActivity
    BaseActivity is the activity to be extended by other activities.
    This design structure handles onPause() and onEvent() listeners regardless of what activity is at the foreground when the events are triggered.
    CloudPageActivity
    CloudPageActivity displays a Cloud Page.
    CloudPageInboxActivity
    CloudPageInboxActivity works as an inbox for the Cloud Pages received.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity is the primary activity.
    MainActivityFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing the home view.
    MapsActivity
    MapsActivity displays a Google map with the regions configured at Marketing Cloud.
    MCBeacon
    MCBeacon class stores beacon message data.
    MCGeofence
    MCGeofence class stores geolocation message data.
    MCLocationManager
    MCLocationManager class manages the geofence and beacon location messages.
    SettingsActivity
    SettingsActivity is the primary settings activity.
    SettingsFragment
    SettingsFragment handles settings that would normally be included within your customer facing app.
